name: brresi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wb(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c3)))

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c3))), wcel(c3, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c3)))
-| wcel(c3, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c3, universe), wb(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c3))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c3)))
-| wcel(c3, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c3, universe), wb(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c3))))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c3, universe), wb(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c3))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, cres(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wbr(c0, c1, c3)))
-| wcel(c3, universe)

comment: Binary relation on a restriction. (Contributed by NM, 12-Dec-2006.)
